421874:
Hunting spires
And an audience in the house of God
Such strange times
Pull me from my knees, genuflect and leave
Braving the weather, evading the stares
Save it for someone who cares

City life
In the glory of pink communal skies
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613233194)

Fine for a while
We were happy 'til it died
Fate shook the reins
From the hands of my accomplice
Seven storey signs
Written in a simple language

Turned into stone
All the people they had known
Lost on their way
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613233194)

In God you place our mistrust
Train lines and paperback books
How life can turn on a whim
Closed doors can open again

All my days
There won't be so much at stake
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613233194)

Ain't it sad the vicar lost his face
The congregation warned them not to stray
They ran him out of town
He's always getting caught with his trousers down

...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613233194)

The wolf at the door he came knocking again
He told me that I was no good
He left me bereft of a hopeful concept
He lapped up the pieces and ran

A friend he once said I've turned into my dad
I found such a comfortable spot
The dreams I once had are all faded and black
He said his goodbyes and was gone

If God did give me a choice
I would take it
I would take it
If God did give me choice
I would take it
I would take it

The years they have passed with such sickening speed
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613233194)

All the hope
That you give
Ain't enough
For me to cling to
And the life
That I live
Ain't enough
For me to cling to
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613233194)

Someday we all shall cease to exist
Someday our tiles will fall
Roots will reclaim the bricks that we lay
Worms will reclaim this soil

You get alone, you get stoned
Sometimes you need someone
You get alone, you get cold
Sometimes you need someone

Salt in the ocean raises the words
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613233194)

Wait all year
For the parting shot
For the epilogue
For the moment when it stops
And the days fade away

In no doubt
As I leave this town
I will not return
For I haven’t got the room

(1409613233194)

And so we stare once more into the breach
Our faults we hide behind the calm relief
The signs were all there but I never saw them
Just kept moving with my arms up and my throat exposed
To the monsters ever looming
In the darkest place I know

...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613233194)

She said it's a tough, tough world
The things that I've seen, will leave you shivering
I set myself in to her, we changed like the lights
On a busy street
Checking constantly

That we're happy
To be here

She said let your whiskers grow
Bearing the lines, broken promises
You made to yourself and her
How does it feel
Sitting silently
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613233194)

The brainchild of the science fiction hat
When you get to the end, you get to watch it back
We tread the same misguided path and force the same embarrassed laugh and watch the matador attack

And the interloper will fall down in the shower
He'll split his head, he'll die within the hour
Pass into beautiful sleep, and like the secrets you keep
I wish I had that power
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613233194)

Sitting on a beach declaring my intentions
Trying to find a way to focus your affection
In a matter of time I know I'll find you
In a matter of time I know I'll find you

Here's another name to add to your collection
She lacks in desire what I lack in direction
In a matter of time I know I'll find it
In a matter of time I know I'll find it

Cos there ain't no easy way out
Of the whirlpool ride
No there ain't no way to get out
